comment.author: 52682399@N07
comment._content:
The Onyx marquee shows Chubby Jackson playing there. This was early July 1947.
(Goings on about Town, New Yorker July 19, 1947.
De Paris is standing on the stairs leading up to Jimmy Ryan's, Which was neighbor to the Onyx.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: This photo (just De Paris' head) was used by Gottlieb in Down Beat magazine (July 30, 1947) memory.loc.gov/cgi-bin/ampage?collId=wgpubs&fileName=...
